title: Fast, Flexible, and Exact Minimum Flow Decompositions via ILP
further research:
10
    Given the maturity of ILP solvers and Toboggan’s intrinsic exponential dependence on k, it is not surpris-
ing that an ILP for MFD using a quadratic number of variables performs signiﬁcantly better than Toboggan
for larger k values. However, since for small k values our ILP formulations are still slower, as future work it
would be interesting to further devise more eﬃcient MFD solvers (e.g., as a start, run Toboggan when the
instance is detected as being “small enough”). It would also be interesting to extend our ILP formulations to ﬂow networks with cycles.
label: C_centroid

title: Comprehensive survey of computational learning methods for analysis of gene expression data in genomics
further research:
The centroids are
recomputed in order to minimize the sum of distances between the genes in a cluster and their
corresponding centroid [203]. After clustering, a scoring algorithm such as Relief [204] is
utilized and high-scoring gene features of each cluster are selected for further analysis. Since
the computational complexity of K-means is linear with respect to the number of instances,
clusters, and dimensions, it is one of the fastest clustering techniques.

title: A comprehensive survey on computational learning methods for analysis of gene expression data
further research:
In K-means
clustering, an arbitrary K number of points from the data are selected as centroids, and all the genes
are allocated to the nearest centroid (MacQueen, 1967; Kanungo et al., 2002). After clustering, a
scoring algorithm such as Relief (Kira and Rendell, 1992) is utilized and high-scoring gene features

                                                                                                                                 17
of each cluster are selected for further analysis. The computational complexity of K-means is linear
with respect to the number of instances, clusters, and dimensions.
label: A

The results obtained in this section, allow us to conﬁrm that the lyn2vec method is
eﬀective in providing representations of sequencing reads useful in machine learning
problems.

removed because less than 90% of all the valid markers were called in their samples.
